sentences.english: Then it ups the ante with a shiny tricot fabric finish.
sentences.chinese: 然後它上升在前以發光的手編織品織品結束。

sentences.english: He sold the knitted works he made to earn money.
sentences.chinese: 他將自己做的編織品拿出來賣錢。

sentences.english: The rich and unique exhiBition of hand-knitted products has attracted many Chinese and foreign customers.
sentences.chinese: 豐盛別緻的手編織品展覽會，吸引了衆多中外顧客。
